GSP29snyayvau:456: para-rūpa-vyāvartana-kṣamâsādhāraṇa-pramāṇa-dharma-kathana-rūpāyāṃ jñāyate nirṇīyate 'smābhir na prayojanaṃ tat-phalam, atisūkṣmatvāt tāvakâbhisandher iti kākvā praśnayaty ulluṇṭhayati cêti. kiṃ ca,

GSP29snyayvau:464: tal-lakṣaṇaṃ niścitam aniścitaṃ vā. na tāvad aniścitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣayati. niścayo 'pi pramāṇād apramāṇād vā. apramāṇān niścayâsiddheḥ pramāṇād iti vaktavyam. tad apy alakṣaṇaṃ salakṣaṇaṃ vā. alakṣaṇatve

GSP29snyayvau:474: tat-svarūpam anubhavanto 'pi na lakṣayanti, tatas tān avalokayatām asmākaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:476: yathâvasthita-pramāṇa-lakṣaṇâvir-bhāvana-dvāreṇa vyāmoham eteṣām apasārayāma iti pramāṇa-lakṣaṇâbhidhānaṃ prati pravartate cetaḥ. tad idaṃ prayojanaṃ: tad-vyāmoha-nivṛttiḥ syād iti; tasmin pramāṇa-lakṣaṇe vyāmoho viparītâbhyupagamavatāṃ viparyāsa-lakṣaṇas tīrthyānāṃ
GSP29snyayvau:478: laukikānām, tasya nivṛttir aviparīta-lakṣaṇâvagamād apagama ity arthaḥ, sā syād bhavet. keṣām ity āha: vyāmūḍhaṃ viparīta-graha-grastaṃ vicittatāṃ gataṃ mano 'ntaḥ-karaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā teṣām; ihêti loke -- tad ayaṃ tātparyârthaḥ. yady anādi prasiddhaṃ pramāṇa-lakṣaṇaṃ prati na kecid api vyāmuhyeyus tadā yad bhavadbhiḥ prāg udagrāhi: ‘nirarthakaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:479: pramāṇa-lakṣaṇâbhidhānam'; iti tad yuktam eva syāt. na câitad evaṃ; tatra vyāmūḍhānāṃ darśanāt. etena yad adāyi dūṣaṇaṃ ‘pramāṇa-lakṣaṇam aniścitaṃ niścitaṃ vâbhidhīyata'; ity-ādi tad api siddha-sādhyatā-madhya-pratibaddhatvān na bādhâvidhāyy asmākam iti

GSP29snyayvau:484: vyavasāya-rūpatvād, vacanaṃ punar viparītâropa-nirākaraṇe vyāpriyata iti sthitam. tad evaṃ pramāṇa-lakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyena pratipādya tad-gataṃ kucodyaṃ paryahāry ācāryeṇa.

GSP29snyayvau:1120: [NAV_24.1] sādhanaṃ sādhyâkrāntam upadarśayitum abhipretaṃ yasmiṃs tat
GSP29snyayvau:1121: sādharmyaṃ, tena. atra vyatikare; dūṣyanta iti doṣāḥ. dṛṣṭântā eva doṣā
GSP29snyayvau:1122: dṛṣṭânta-doṣāḥ dṛṣṭântâbhāsā ity arthaḥ. nyāya-vid-īritā vidvadbhir
GSP29snyayvau:1123: gaditāḥ; sādhyaṃ gamyam; ādi-śabdāt sādhanôbhaya-parigrahas; tad-vikalās
GSP29snyayvau:1125: kiṃ-bhūtā ete ity āha: apagataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yebhyas te tathā, te ca te
GSP29snyayvau:1126: hetavaḥ, tebhya utthā utthānaṃ yeṣāṃ te 'palakṣaṇa-hetûtthāḥ; idaṃ ca prāyikaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ, samyag-ghetāv api vaktṛ-doṣa-vaśāt
GSP29snyayvau:1127: dṛṣṭântâbhāsatôpapatter, yathā: nityânityaḥ śabdaḥ, śrāvaṇatvād, ghaṭavad
GSP29snyayvau:1129: [NAV_24.2] tatra sādhya-vikalo yathā: bhrāntam anumānaṃ, pramāṇatvāt,
GSP29snyayvau:1131: sakala-vyavahārôccheda-prasaṅgāt, tad-ucchede ca pramāṇa-prameyâbhāvān na kiñcit kenacit sādhyata iti bhrānta-vādino mūkatâpanipadyeta.
GSP29snyayvau:1135: yathā: nâsti sarva-jñaḥ, pratyakṣâdy-anupalabdhatvāt, ghaṭavad; ghaṭasya sattvāt pratyakṣâdibhir upalabdhatvāc ca. sandigdha-sādhya-dharmo yathā:
GSP29snyayvau:1141: sandigdhatvād, vīta-rāgasyâpi tathā sambhavād iti. sandigdhôbhaya-dharmo
GSP29snyayvau:1144: [NAV_24.3] nanu ca parair anyad api dṛṣṭântâbhāsa-trayam uktam, tad yathânanvayo 'pradarśitânvayo viparītânvayaś cêti. tatrânanvayo yathā:
GSP29snyayvau:1145: rāgâdimān vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo, vaktṛtvād, iṣṭa-puruṣavad iti. yady api kilêṣṭa-puruṣe rāgâdimattvaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ ca sādhya-sādhana-dharmau dṛṣṭau,
GSP29snyayvau:1146: tathâpi yo yo vaktā sa sa rāgâdimān iti vyāpty-asiddher ananvayo 'yaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1147: dṛṣṭântaḥ. tathâpradarśitânvayo yathânityaḥ śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvād, ghaṭavad
GSP29snyayvau:1148: iti. atra yady api vāstavo 'nvayo 'sti, tathâpi vādinā vacanena na prakāśita ity apradarśitânvayo dṛṣṭântaḥ. viparitânvayo yathânityaḥ śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvād iti hetum abhidhāya yad anityaṃ tad kṛtakaṃ ghaṭavad
GSP29snyayvau:1149: iti, viparīta-vyāpti-darśanād viparītânvayaḥ, sādharmya-prayoge hi sādhanaṃ sādhyâkrāntam upadarśanīyam, iha tu viparyāsa-darśanād
GSP29snyayvau:1150: viparītatā. tad etad bhavadbhiḥ kasmān nôktam iti.
GSP29snyayvau:1152: dṛṣṭântâbhāsa-trayâbhidhānam iti jñāpanârtham. tathā hi: na tāvad ananvayo
GSP29snyayvau:1153: dṛṣṭântâbhāso bhavitum arhati. yadi hi dṛṣṭânta-balena vyāptiḥ
GSP29snyayvau:1154: sādhya-sādhanayoḥ pratipādyeta, tataḥ syād anavayo dṛṣṭântâbhāsaḥ,
GSP29snyayvau:1156: dṛṣṭântôdāhṛtir iti sthitaṃ, tadânanvayatva-lakṣaṇo na dṛṣṭântasya doṣaḥ,
GSP29snyayvau:1157: kiṃ tarhi hetor eva, pratibandhasyâdyâpi pramāṇenâpratiṣṭhitatvāt,
GSP29snyayvau:1158: pratibandhâbhāve cânvayâsiddheḥ. na ca hetu-doṣo 'pi dṛṣṭânte vācyo,
GSP29snyayvau:1159: 'tiprasaṅgād iti. tathâpradarśitânvaya-viparītânvayāv api na dṛṣṭântâbhāsatāṃ svī-kuruto,
GSP29snyayvau:1162: vaktṛ-doṣatve 'pi parârthânumāne tat-kauśalam apekṣata iti. evaṃ côpanyāse
GSP29snyayvau:1163: na bubhutsitârtha-sādhakāv ato dṛṣṭântâbhāsāv etāv iti ced, evaṃ tarhi karaṇâpāṭavâdayo 'pi dṛṣṭântâbhāsā vācyāḥ. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvau:1165: vispaṣṭa-varṇâgrahaṇe vyaktatayā tad-arthâvagamâbhāvād ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvau:1166: [NAV_25.0] tad evaṃ sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭântâbhāsān pratipādya vaidharmyeṇâha:
GSP29snyayvau:1170: tad vaidharmyam, tenâtra dṛṣṭânta-doṣā nyāya-vid-īritā iti dattârtham.
GSP29snyayvau:1172: ca-śabdasya vyavahita-prayogatvāt saṃśayāc ca nivṛtti-sandehāc cêty
GSP29snyayvau:1173: arthaḥ. tad anena ṣaḍ dṛṣṭântâbhāsāḥ sūcitās, tad yathā --
GSP29snyayvau:1177: [NAV_25.2] tatra sādhyâvyatirekī yathā: bhrāntam anumānam, pramāṇatvād
GSP29snyayvau:1178: iti. atra vaidharmya-dṛṣṭânto: yat punar bhrāntaṃ na bhavati na tat
GSP29snyayvau:1179: pramāṇaṃ, tad yathā svapna-jñānam iti; svapna-jñānād bhrāntatânivṛtteḥ sādhyâvyatirekitvam iti. sādhanâvyatirekī yathā: nirvikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ,
GSP29snyayvau:1180: pramāṇatvād iti. atra vaidharmya-dṛṣṭânto: yat punaḥ savikalpakaṃ na tat pramāṇaṃ, tad yathânumānam; anumānāt pramāṇatânivṛtteḥ sādhanâvyatirekitvam iti. ubhayâvyatirekī yathā: nityânityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29snyayvau:1181: sattvād iti. atra vaidharmya-dṛṣṭânto: yaḥ punar na nityânityaḥ sa na san,
GSP29snyayvau:1182: tad yathā -- ghaṭo; ghaṭād ubhayasyâpy avyāvṛtter ubhayâvyatirekitvam iti.
GSP29snyayvau:1183: tathā sandigdha-sādhya-vyatireko yathâsarva-jñā anāptā vā kapilâdayo,ārya-satya-catuṣṭayâpratipādakatvād iti. atra
GSP29snyayvau:1184: vaidharmya-dṛṣṭânto: yaḥ punaḥ sarva-jña āpto vā 'sāv
GSP29snyayvau:1185: ārya-satya-catuṣṭayaṃ pratyapīpadat, tad yathā -- śauddhôdanir iti. ayaṃ ca sādhyâvyatirekī
GSP29snyayvau:1189: sandigdha-sādhya-vyatirekatayā pratibhātîti tathôpanyastaḥ. tathā hi: yady apy ārya-satya-catuṣṭayaṃ śauddhôdaniḥ pratipāditavāṃs, tathâpi sarvajñatâptate tasya na siddhyataḥ, tābhyāṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1193: tathā-vidha-pratipādanasya kartuṃ śakyatvāt. tasmāc chauddhôdaneḥ sakāśād
GSP29snyayvau:1196: 'nādeya-vākyaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgâdimattvād iti. atra
GSP29snyayvau:1197: vaidharmya-dṛṣṭânto: yaḥ punar ādeya-vākyo, na sa rāgādimāṃs, tad yathā --
GSP29snyayvau:1200: sandeha-gocara-cāritām anubhavaty, ataḥ sugatād rāgâdimattā-vyāvṛtti-saṃśayāt sandigdha-sādhana-vyatirekitvam
GSP29snyayvau:1203: iti. atra vaidharmya-dṛṣṭânto: ye punar vīta-rāgās te karuṇâspadeṣu karuṇā-parīta-cittatayā datta-nija-māṃsa-śakalās, tad yathā -- bodhisattvā
GSP29snyayvau:1204: iti. atra sādhya-sādhana-dharmayor bodhisattvebhyo vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā;
GSP29snyayvau:1205: tat-pratipādaka-pramāṇa-vaikalyān na jñāyate kiṃ te rāgâdimanta uta
GSP29snyayvau:1206: vīta-rāgāḥ; tathânukampyeṣu kiṃ sva-piśita-khaṇḍāni dattavanto nêti vā.
GSP29snyayvau:1210: viparīta-vyatirekaś cêti. te 'smābhir ayuktatvān na darśayitavyāḥ. tathā
GSP29snyayvau:1211: hy: avyatirekas tair darśito, yathâvīta-rāgaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo,
GSP29snyayvau:1212: vaktṛtvād iti. atra vaidharmya-ḍṛṣṭânto: yaḥ punar vīta-rāgo, na sa vaktā,
GSP29snyayvau:1213: yathôpala-khaṇḍa iti. yady api kilôpala-khaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ, tathâpi vyāptyā vyatirekâsiddher avyatirekitvam iti. ayuktaś câyaṃ vaktum,
GSP29snyayvau:1214: avyatirekitāyā hetu-doṣatvāt. yadi hi dṛṣṭânta-balenâiva vyatirekaḥ
GSP29snyayvau:1218: dṛṣṭântôpādānāt. na hy ekatra yo yad-abhāve na dṛṣṭaḥ, sa tad-abhāve na
GSP29snyayvau:1220: tasmād asiddha-pratibandhasya hetor evâyaṃ doṣo, na dṛṣṭântasyêti.
GSP29snyayvau:1222: vaktṛ-doṣatvāt. tathā hy: apradarśita-vyatirekas tair ukto, yathânityaḥ
GSP29snyayvau:1223: śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvād, ākāśavad iti. atra vidyamāno 'pi vyatireko vādinā vacanena nôdbhāvita iti duṣṭatā. viparīta-vyatirekaḥ punar abhihito,
GSP29snyayvau:1224: yathânityaḥ śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvād iti. atra vaidharmya-dṛṣṭânto: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityaṃ bhavati, yathâkāśam iti. atra viparyasta-vyatireka-pradarśanād
GSP29snyayvau:1225: viparīta-vyatirekitvam. vaidharmya-prayoge hi sādhyâbhāvaḥ sādhanâbhāvâkrānto darśanīyo, na câievam atra, sādhanâbhāvasya
GSP29snyayvau:1227: [NAV_25.4] vyatirekâpradarśanaṃ viparīta-vyatireka-pradarśanaṃ ca na vastuno doṣaḥ, kiṃ tarhi vacana-kuśalatā-vikalasyâbhidhāyakasya. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvau:1228: yeṣāṃ bhavatām ado darśanaṃ: yad uta svârthânumāna-kāle svayaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1230: hetu-pratipādanam eva kartavyaṃ "viduṣāṃ vācyo hetur eva hi kevala"
GSP29snyayvau:1235: anvaya-vyatirekâparijñāne pratipādyasya na dṛṣṭântam antareṇâitau darśayituṃ śakyāv, ato 'nvaya-vyatireka-darśanârthaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1236: 'bhidhātavyas, tataś ca tat-kāryâkāriṇāṃ tad-ābhāsatêti ced, gale gṛhītasyâyam ullāpas, tathâpy
GSP29snyayvau:1237: dṛṣṭântâbhāsau na vāstavau, kiṃ tarhi vaktṛ-doṣa-samutthāv; ato nâbhidhātuṃ yuktau, tathā-vidhasya
GSP29snyayvau:1239: puṃso vādânadhikāritvān, mātṛkā-pāṭha-śālā-yogyatayā viduṣāṃ vādayitum ayuktatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvau:1240: [NAV_26.0] tad evaṃ parârthânumānaṃ vyācakṣāṇena yad uktaṃ -- yad uta "tat
GSP29snyayvau:1241: pakṣâdi-vacanâtmakam" iti -- tat pakṣa-hetu-dṛṣṭântānāṃ sâbhāsānāṃ pratipādanāt prāyaḥ paryantitaṃ; kevalaṃ tat parôkta-dūṣaṇôddhārād eva samīcīnatām ābibhartîty amunā prastāvena dūṣaṇaṃ sābhāsam abhidhātukāma āha:
GSP29snyayvau:1244: [NAV_26.1] vadana-śīlo vādī pratyāyakas, tenôkta upanyaste; kasmin?
GSP29snyayvau:1245: sādhane; sādhyate pratipādya-pratītāv āropyate 'numeyaṃ yena tat sādhanam.
GSP29snyayvau:1246: tac câneka-rūpaṃ prāk pratyapādi, tad yathā -- kvacid dhetur evâikaḥ,
GSP29snyayvau:1247: kvacit pakṣa-hetū, kvacit pakṣa-hetu-dṛṣṭântāḥ, kvacit ta eva sôpanayāḥ,
GSP29snyayvau:1248: kvacit sanigamanāḥ, kvacid ekâika-tac-chuddhi-vṛddhyêti, pratipādyasya kvacit kathañcit pratyāyayituṃ śakyatvāt, tat-pratyāyanôpāyasya ca sādhanatvād iti. tatrêha samyak-sādhanasya dūṣayitum aśakyatvāt,
GSP29snyayvau:1249: sādhanâbhāsa eva tat-sāmarthyôpapatteḥ, sādhanâbhāsam eva dūṣanôpanipātāt
GSP29snyayvau:1250: prāg avasthāyām anirjñātaṃ sāmānyena sādhana-dhvaninôktaṃ, tatra
GSP29snyayvau:1253: udbhāvanaṃ prāśnikānāṃ purataḥ prakāśanaṃ yat tad dūṣyate
GSP29snyayvau:1256: [NAV_26.2] adhunā tad-ābhāsam āha: nirgataṃ samyak-prayuktatvād avadyaṃ pāpaṃ pakṣâdi-doṣa-lakṣaṇaṃ dauṣṭyam asmād iti niravadyaṃ, tasmin sādhane vādinôkta iti vartate. tathâpi matsaritayā pramṛdyôdaraṃ yad avidyamānānāṃ doṣāṇām udbhāvanaṃ tad dūṣaṇa-sthānôpanyastatvāt tat-kāryâkaraṇāt
GSP29snyayvau:1258: dūṣaṇâbhāsam iti; tad eva nāma saṃjñā yasya tat-tathā.
GSP29snyayvau:1260: apaśabdâlaṅkārâdi-doṣāṇāṃ yad udbhāvanaṃ tad api dūṣaṇâbhāsa-nāmakam iti.
GSP29snyayvau:1273: tat-svarūpa-pracchādanaṃ karmêty arthaḥ, sakalaṃ ca tad avāraṇaṃ ca sakalâvaraṇaṃ, tena mukto rahita, ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tat-tathā. ata eva kevalam asahāyam, āvaraṇa-kṣayôpaśama-vicitratayâiva bodhasya nānâkāratayā pravṛtteḥ, sāmastyena punar āvaraṇa-nirdalane vibandhaka-kāraṇa-vaikalyād
GSP29snyayvau:1274: ekâkāratayâiva tasya vivartanāt. ato jñānântara-nirapekṣaṃ yat prakāśate prathate nirupādhikaṃ dyotata ity arthaḥ, tat paramârthataḥ pratyakṣam.
GSP29snyayvau:1275: tad idaṃ sakalâvaraṇa-muktâtmêti-hetu-dvāreṇa tathā kevalaṃ yat prakāśata
GSP29snyayvau:1276: iti-svarūpato nirūpyâdhunā kārya-dvāreṇa nirūpayann āha: sakalârthâtmanāṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1279: pratibhāsanam, ātmano dharma-rūpatayā bhedavad-vivakṣitaṃ jñānam iti yāvat. asya ca pāramārthikatvaṃ, nirupacarita-śabdârthôpapatteḥ. tathā hy:
GSP29snyayvau:1280: akṣa-śabdo jīva-paryāyas, tataś câkṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaṃ,
GSP29snyayvau:1281: yatrâtmanaḥ sākṣād vyāpāraḥ. vyāvahārikaṃ punar indriya-vyavahitâtma-vyāpāra-sampādyatvāt paramârthataḥ parokṣam eva:
GSP29snyayvau:1283: [NAV_27.2] nanu ca prasiddhaṃ lakṣyam anūdyâprasiddhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate
GSP29snyayvau:1284: -- sarvatrâyaṃ nyāyaḥ. aprasiddhe punar lakṣye lakṣaṇam abhidhīyamānam ambarâravindinī-kusuma-lakṣaṇavan nirgocaratāṃ yāyāt. tad idaṃ svarūpato
GSP29snyayvau:1285: 'prasādhya lakṣaṇam abhidadhānasya ko 'bhiprāya ity; atrôcyate -- ye ye mithyâvalepâdhmātântaḥ-karaṇāḥ pramāṇa-prasiddham apy adaḥ prati
GSP29snyayvau:1286: vipratipadyante, teṣāṃ dhy-āndhī-kṛta-buddhitvād avadhāraṇīyatām anena darśayati. kim asya pratipādakaṃ pramāṇam iti ced, ete brūmaḥ:
GSP29snyayvau:1288: tad-gocarânumāna-pravṛtteḥ; iha yad-yad-gocaram anumānaṃ pravartate, tasya tasya grāhakaṃ kiñcit pratyakṣam udaya-padavīṃ samāsādayati, yathā
GSP29snyayvau:1289: citra-bhānoḥ; pravartate ca sakalârtha-viṣayam anumānam; atas
GSP29snyayvau:1290: tad-avalokinā viśada-darśanenâpi bhāvyam iti. sarvârtha-viṣayaṃ kim anumānaṃ pravartata iti ced, idam api brūma: iha yad yad asti tat tat
GSP29snyayvau:1291: sarvaṃ sthity-udayâpavarga-saṃsargam anubhavati, vastutvāt; yad yad vastu
GSP29snyayvau:1292: tat tat sthema-janma-pralayaiḥ kroḍī-kṛtaṃ; tad yathâṅgulir aṅgulitva-vakratva-rjutvâpekṣayêti; vastu ca yad asty, ataḥ
GSP29snyayvau:1293: prastuta-trayâkrāntaṃ tad avagantavyam. idam eva nikhilârtha-gocaram
GSP29snyayvau:1295: vibandhaka-kāraṇâbhāvād viśada-darśanī-bhavati. na cânumāna-pravṛttāv apy anarthitvâdinā pramātur apravṛttāv anumeya-gocara-pratyakṣâsambhavena
GSP29snyayvau:1296: vyabhicāraś codanīyaḥ, sambhavasya sādhyatayâbhipretatvāt. na ca sambhava-mātre 'sti vyabhicāraḥ, sarvânumeyānāṃ sambhavat-pratyakṣatayā
GSP29snyayvau:1299: vidyamāna-śuddhy-upāyatvād; iha yo yo vidyamāna-śuddhy-upāyaḥ sa sa sambhavat-samasta-śuddhiko;
GSP29snyayvau:1300: vidyamāna-kṣāra-mṛt-puṭa-pākâdi-śuddhy-upāyo ratna-viśeṣas, tathā ca vidyamāna-jñānâdy-abhyāsa-śuddhy-upāya ātmâtaḥ sambhavat-samasta-śuddhika
GSP29snyayvau:1301: iti. sāmastya-śuddhaś câtmā jñāna-jñāninoḥ kathañcid abhedāt kevalam
GSP29snyayvau:1302: abhidhīyata iti. jñānâdy-abhyāsaḥ kathaṃ viśuddhi-kāraṇam iti ced,
GSP29snyayvau:1303: āvaraṇa-mala-pratipakṣa-rūpatvād iti brūmaḥ. pratipakṣa-rūpatā katham avadhāritêiti cet, tavâiva darśanāt. tathā hi: dṛśyate jñānâdy-abhyāsataḥ
GSP29snyayvau:1306: sāmastyôcchedaḥ syād ity abhidadhmahe. etena yat pare procur -- yathā:

GSP29snyayvau:1509: 'smad-abhyupagamaḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavato 'pramāṇaṃ vā? pramāṇaṃ ced, yathā
GSP29snyayvau:1511: jāgrat-pratyaya-gocarârtha-samarthanam api kiṃ na kuruṣe, ko 'yam
GSP29snyayvau:1512: ardha-jaratīya-nyāyaḥ? athâpramāṇam, evaṃ sati svapna-pratyaya-nirālambanatā-sādhakaṃ pramāṇântaraṃ mṛgaṇīyaṃ, kim anena kuśa-kāśâvalambanena. tatrâpi pramāṇântare vikalpa-yugalam amalam
GSP29snyayvau:1513: avatarati: tat kiṃ nirālambanaṃ sâlambanaṃ vā? nirālambanaṃ cen,
GSP29snyayvau:1514: nânya-pratyayasya nirālambanatāṃ gadituṃ paṭiṣṭhaṃ, nirgocaratvāt. atha
GSP29snyayvau:1515: sâlambanaṃ, hanta hato 'si, nirālambanāḥ sarve pratyayā iti
GSP29snyayvau:1516: pratijñāta-kṣater, anenâiva vyabhicārād iti śaṭhaḥ pratiśaṭhâcaraṇena nirloṭhanīyaḥ. tan
GSP29snyayvau:1523: anekânta-gocaratāṃ pramāṇasya parān abhyupagamayatîty alam vistareṇa.
GSP29snyayvau:1524: tasmāt ‘tasyâiva tatra pratibhāsanāt'; sarva-saṃvidām anekântâtmakaṃ vastu gocara iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvau:1526: pramāṇa-gocaro darśitaḥ. nayas tarhi kiṃ-bhūtam taṃ manyata iti
GSP29snyayvau:1527: vacanâvakāśe saty āha: ekêty-ādi. ananta-dharmâdhyāsitaṃ vastu
GSP29snyayvau:1529: nayaḥ, pramāṇa-pravṛtter uttara-kāla-bhāvī parāmarśa ity arthas; tasya viṣayo gocaro mato 'bhipreta eka-deśenânityatvâdi-dharma-lakṣaṇena
GSP29snyayvau:1530: viśiṣṭaḥ para-rūpebhyo vibhinno 'rthaḥ prameya-rūpaṃ, pramāṇam evaṃ-vidham
GSP29snyayvau:1531: evârthaṃ gṛhṇātîti svâkutena tena vyavasthāpanād iti.
GSP29snyayvau:1533: catur-vidhāṃ vipratipattiṃ nirākṛtyâtrâiva naya-gocaraṃ nirūpayann āha:
GSP29snyayvau:1534: ekêty-ādi. nanu câdi-vākyena pramāṇa-vyutpādana-mātraṃ pratijñānaṃ, tat kiṃ ayam aprastuto 'tra naya-gocaraḥ pratipādyata iti. satyaṃ, evaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1535: manyate: na nayaḥ pramāṇād atyantaṃ dūra-yāyī, kiṃ tarhi tad-aṃśa-bhūta
GSP29snyayvau:1539: [NAV_29.12] atrâpi padârthaḥ sa eva, kevalaṃ vākyârtha-bhedaḥ. tathā
GSP29snyayvau:1540: hîhâivaṃ ghaṭanā: nayasya viṣaya eka-deśa-viśiṣṭo 'rtho mato nītividām iti. nanu ca yadi nayasya pramāṇântaḥ-pātitve 'pi pṛthag gocaraḥ pratipādyate, tataḥ pramāṇavad etad-viṣayā lakṣaṇâdi-vipratipattir api
GSP29snyayvau:1541: nirākartavyā. satyaṃ, kiṃ tu na pareṣāṃ naya-vyavahāraḥ prasiddho, 'to
GSP29snyayvau:1542: dharmiṇo 'bhāvāt tad-gocarā vipratipattir nâsty eva. na ca te tena tattvaṃ pratipādanīyās, tattva-pratipādane pramāṇasyâiva vyāpārān, nayasya punar eka-deśa-niṣṭhatvena tat-pratipādana-sāmarthya-vikalatvād, ata evâcāryasya na tal-lakṣaṇâdi-svarūpa-kathane 'pi mahânādaraḥ. gocaraṃ punar heya-pakṣe
GSP29snyayvau:1543: kākvā prakṣipan sākṣāt pratipādayati: mā bhūt sva-darśanântaḥ-pātināṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1544: manda-buddhīnāṃ pramāṇa-pratipanne 'py anekântâtmake vastuny eka-deśa-samarthanâbhiniveśa-lakṣaṇaḥ kadāgraha iti. athavā
GSP29snyayvau:1548: para-rūpa-vyāvartana-kṣamatvāc câsya. saṃkhyayā punar anantā iti,
GSP29snyayvau:1550: nayatvāt, tathâpi cirantanâcāryaiḥ sarva-saṅgrāhi-saptâbhiprāya-parikalpanā-dvāreṇa sapta nayāḥ pratipāditāḥ.
GSP29snyayvau:1553: iti. ato 'smābhir api ta eva varṇyante.
GSP29snyayvau:1554: [NAV_29.13] katham ete sarvâbhiprāya-saṅgrāhakā iti ced, ucyate:
GSP29snyayvau:1556: gaty-antarâbhāvād; arthaś ca sāmānya-rūpo viśeṣa-rūpo vā, śabdo 'pi
GSP29snyayvau:1557: rūḍhito vyutpattitaś ca, vyutpattir api sāmānya-nimitta-prayuktā
GSP29snyayvau:1558: tat-kāla-bhāvi-nimitta-prayuktā vā syāt. tatra ye kecanârtha-nirūpaṇa-pravaṇāḥ pramātr-abhiprāyās te sarve 'py ādye
GSP29snyayvau:1560: sāmānya-viśeṣāv icchanti tat-samudāya-rūpo naigamaḥ. ye punaḥ kevalaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1561: sāmānyaṃ vāñchanti tat-samūha-sampādyaḥ saṅgrahaḥ. ye punar anapekṣita-śāstrīya-sāmānya-viśeṣaṃ loka-vyavahāram avatarantaṃ ghaṭâdikaṃ padârtham abhiprayanti tan-nicaya-janyo vyavahāraḥ. ye tu kṣaṇa-kṣayiṇaḥ
GSP29snyayvau:1562: paramâṇu-lakṣaṇā viśeṣāḥ satyā iti manyante tat-saṅghāta-ghaṭita ṛjusūtra
GSP29snyayvau:1563: iti. tathā ye rūḍhitaḥ śabdānāṃ pravṛttiṃ vāñchanti tan-nivaha-sādhyaḥ
GSP29snyayvau:1564: śabda iti. ye tu vyutpattito dhvanīnāṃ pravṛttiṃ vāñchanti nânyathā
GSP29snyayvau:1565: tad-vāra-janyaḥ samabhirūḍha iti. ye tu vartamāna-kāla-bhāvi-vyutpatti-nimittam adhikṛtya śabdāḥ pravartante
GSP29snyayvau:1566: nânyathêti manyante tat-saṅgha-ghaṭitaḥ khalv evambhūta iti. tad evaṃ na
GSP29snyayvau:1567: kaścid vikalpo 'sti vastu-gocaro yo 'tra naya-saptake nântar-yātîti
GSP29snyayvau:1569: [NAV_29.14] sāmpratam eṣām eva pratyekaṃ matam upavarṇayāmaḥ. tatra gamanaṃ gamaḥ pariccheda ity arthaḥ. niścito gamo nigamo
GSP29snyayvau:1571: svârthikâṇ-pratyaya-vidhānān naigamaḥ. yadi vā nigamyante niyataṃ paricchidyanta iti nigamā arthās teṣu bhavo yo 'bhiprāyo
GSP29snyayvau:1572: niyata-pariccheda-rūpaḥ sa naigama iti. ayaṃ hi sattā-lakṣaṇaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1576: atyanta-vinirluṭhita-svarūpān abhipraiti. tathā hi: kila saṃvin-niṣṭhāḥ
GSP29snyayvau:1577: padârtha-vyavasthitayo, na ca sāmānya-grāhiṇi vijñāne viśeṣâvabhāso 'sty,
GSP29snyayvau:1579: sāmānya-grāhakatvâyogāt. nâpi viśeṣa-grahaṇa-dakṣe saṃvedane sāmānyaṃ cakāsti, viśiṣṭa-deśa-daśâvacchinna-padârtha-grāhitayā
GSP29snyayvau:1580: anyathā viśeṣa-saṃvedanatvâyogāt. na câitau paraspara-vibhinnāv api pratibhāsamānau sāmānya-viśeṣau kathañcin miśrayitum yuktāv, atiprasaṅgād,
GSP29snyayvau:1581: vibhinna-pratibhāsinām api nikhilârthâtmanām aikya-prāpteḥ. evaṃ ca pramāṇayati: paraspara-viśliṣṭau sāmānya-viśeṣau, pārthakyenôpalabdher,
GSP29snyayvau:1582: iha yad yat pārthakyenôpalabhyate tat tat paraspara-viśliṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ, tad yathā -- devadatta-yajñadattāv iti, pārthakyena côpalabhyete
GSP29snyayvau:1583: sāmānya-viśeṣāv, ataḥ paraspara-vibhinnāv iti. na sāmānyāt pṛthag
GSP29snyayvau:1584: viśeṣôpalambha iti cet, kathaṃ tarhi tasyôpalambha iti vācyam.
GSP29snyayvau:1585: sāmānya-vyāptasyêti cen, na tarhi sa viśeṣôpalambhaḥ, sāmānyasyâpi tena grahaṇāt; tataś ca tena bodhena vivikta-viśeṣa-grahaṇâbhāvāt tad-vācakaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1586: dhvaniṃ tat-sādhyaṃ ca vyavahāraṃ na pravartayet pramātā; na câitad asti,
GSP29snyayvau:1588: tatra ca vyavahāraṃ pravartayatā tad-grāhako bodho vivikto 'bhyupagantavyaḥ. tathā sāmānyam api viviktâkāratayā sva-grāhiṇi jñāne yadi na prakāśeta, tadā tad-gocarâbhimata-saṃvedanena viśeṣasyâpy ākalanāt sāmānyâbhidhāna-vyavahārayoḥ pravṛtter ucchedas tathâiva vaktavyo,
GSP29snyayvau:1589: vivikta-sāmānya-grāhi-bodha-mūlakatvāt tayos, tad-aniṣṭau tayor apy abhāvâpatteḥ. na ca sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaṃ vā tiras-kṛtya kevalasya viśeṣasya sāmānyasya vâbhyupagamaḥ kartuṃ yukto, dvayor api sva-grāhi-jñāne
GSP29snyayvau:1590: pratibhāsamānatayā viśeṣâbhāvāt. tasmād etau dvāv apîtarêtara-viśakalitāv
GSP29snyayvau:1592: [NAV_29.15] adhunā saṅgrahâbhiprāyo varṇyate. tatra saṅgṛhṇāty aśeṣa-viśeṣa-tiro-dhāna-dvāreṇa sāmānya-rūpatayā jagad ādatta iti
GSP29snyayvau:1593: saṅgrahaḥ. ayaṃ hi manyate: bhāva-lakṣaṇa-sāmānyād vyatiricyamāna-mūrtayo
GSP29snyayvau:1594: vā viśeṣāḥ parikalpyerann, avyatiricyamāna-mūrtayo vā, gaty-antarâbhāvāt.
GSP29snyayvau:1595: tatra yady ādyaḥ pakṣas, tadā niḥsvabhāvatāṃ te svī-kuryur,
GSP29snyayvau:1596: bhāva-vyatirekitvād, gagana-kusumâdivat. atha dvitīyaḥ kalpas, tarhi
GSP29snyayvau:1597: bhāva-mātram āpadyante. tathā hi: bhāva-mātraṃ viśeṣās,
GSP29snyayvau:1598: tad-avyatiriktatvād, iha yad yato 'vyatiriktaṃ tat tad eva bhavati, tad yathā -- bhāvasyâiva svarūpam, avyatirekiṇaś ca viśeṣā, atas tad-rūpā eva.
GSP29snyayvau:1599: nanu ca yadi bhāva-mātram eva tattvaṃ tadā tasya sarvatrâviśeṣād ya ete
GSP29snyayvau:1601: vyavahārās te sarve 'pi pralayam āpadyerann, ato viśeṣā api
GSP29snyayvau:1605: viśeṣâgraho viśeṣeṇa tyājyo, viśeṣa-vyavasthāpaka-pramāṇâbhāvāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvau:1606: bheda-rūpā viśeṣāḥ, na ca kiñcit pramāṇaṃ bhedam avagāhate, pratyakṣaṃ hi tāvad bhāva-sampādita-sattākaṃ tam eva sākṣat-kartuṃ yuktam, nâbhāvaṃ,
GSP29snyayvau:1608: anutpādakasya ca sākṣāt-karaṇe sarva-sākṣāt-karaṇa-prasaṅgāt, tathā ca viśeṣâbhāvāt sarvo draṣṭāsarva-darśīsyāt. aniṣṭam câitad bhavatāṃ, tasmād
GSP29snyayvau:1609: bhāva-grāhakam eva tad eṣṭavyam. sa ca bhāvaḥ sarvatrâviśiṣṭa iti tathâiva
GSP29snyayvau:1610: tena grāhyas, tad-uttara-kāla-bhāvī punar vikalpo ghaṭo 'yaṃ paṭâdir na bhavatîty evam-ākāro vyavahāraṃ racayann avidyā-mūlatvān na pramāṇaṃ, tan na pratyakṣād viśeṣâvagatiḥ. nâpy anumānâdeḥ, pratyakṣa-mūlakatvāc
GSP29snyayvau:1611: cheṣa-pramāṇa-vargasya, tasmāt sāmānyam eva paramârtho, na viśeṣā iti
GSP29snyayvau:1613: [NAV_29.16] sāmprataṃ vyavahāra-matam ucyate. tatra vyavaharaṇaṃ vyavahriyate vânena laukikair abhiprāyeṇêti vyavahāraḥ. ayaṃ tu manyate:
GSP29snyayvau:1614: yathā loka-grāham eva vastv astu, kim
GSP29snyayvau:1617: nêtarasya, na hi sāmānyam anādi-nidhanam ekaṃ saṅgrāhâbhimataṃ pramāṇa-bhūmis, tathânubhavâbhāvāt, sarvasya sarva-darśitva-prasaṅgāc ca.
GSP29snyayvau:1618: nâpi viśeṣāḥ paramâṇu-lakṣaṇāḥ kṣaṇa-kṣayiṇaḥ pramāṇa-gocaras, tathā pravṛtter abhāvāt. tasmād idam eva nikhila-lokâbādhitaṃ pramāṇa-prasiddhaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1622: ajyāyasī, tatra pramāṇa-prasarâbhāvāt, pramāṇam antareṇa ca vicārasya kartum aśakyatvāt. avastutvāc ca teṣāṃ, kiṃ tad-gocara-paryālocanena?
GSP29snyayvau:1624: kṣaṇa-kṣayi-paramâṇu-lakṣaṇā vā viśeṣā na kañcana loka-vyavahāram
GSP29snyayvau:1625: uparacayanti, tan na te vastu-rūpā, loka-vyavahārôpayogināṃ eva vastutvād iti vyavahāraḥ.
GSP29snyayvau:1626: [NAV_29.17] sāmprataṃ ṛjusūtrâbhiprāyaḥ kathyate. tatra rju praguṇam
GSP29snyayvau:1628: rūpaṃ sūtrayati niṣṭaṅkitaṃ darśayatîty ṛjusūtraḥ. tathā hy: asyâbhiprāyo
GSP29snyayvau:1632: tad-abhāvān na tayor vastutvam iti. vartamāna-kṣaṇâliṅgitaṃ ca punar vastu-rūpaṃ samastârtha-kriyāsu vyāpriyata iti tad eva pāramārthikam. tad api ca niraṃśam abhyupagantavyam, aṃśa-vyāpter yukti-riktatvād,
GSP29snyayvau:1634: aneka-svabhāvatâivâstv iti cen, na, virodha-vyāghrâghrātatvāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvau:1635: yady ekaḥ svabhāvaḥ katham anekaḥ? anekaś cet katham ekaḥ? ekânekayoḥ
GSP29snyayvau:1636: paraspara-parihāreṇâvasthānāt; tasmāt svarūpa-nimagnāḥ paramâṇava eva parasparôpasarpaṇa-dvāreṇa kathañcin nicaya-rūpatām āpannā nikhila-kāryeṣu
GSP29snyayvau:1637: vyāpāra-bhāja iti ta eva svalakṣaṇaṃ, na sthūratāṃ dhārayat pāramārthikaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1638: iti. kiṃ ca, pramāṇato 'rtha-vyavasthā, na ca pramāṇaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1642: tataś ca tat tat-kāla-sambaddham eva vastuno rūpaṃ sākṣāt-kartuṃ kṣamate na pūrvam aparaṃ vâsannidhānād eva. yadi punar vinaṣṭam api
GSP29snyayvau:1644: kṣaṇa-paramparā tatra pratīyeta, tathā ca sati
GSP29snyayvau:1646: anāgata-kṣaṇa-grahaṇe 'pi yojyam; aniṣṭaṃ câitat, tasmāt tad vārtamānika-kṣaṇa-grahaṇa-dakṣam evêty abhyupagantavyam. nanu ca yadi
GSP29snyayvau:1647: kṣaṇa-bhaṅguratām arthâtmanām adhyakṣam avalokayati, tadā nīlatêva pratibhāsamānā sā vipratipatti-gocaraṃ na yāyād iti tad-viṣayo laukikānāṃ vyavahāraḥ pravarteta, na câitad asti, sthiratā-dvāreṇa
GSP29snyayvau:1648: vyavahāra-pravṛtter iti. atra pratividhīyate -- sākṣāt-kurvāṇā api
GSP29snyayvau:1652: ca viparyasta-sthiratā-vyavahāraṃ pravartayanti, tan nâyam adhyakṣasyâparādho, 'pi tu pramātḥṇām eva. tathā ghanâkāro 'pi
GSP29snyayvau:1654: tat-pratibhāsâyogāt, kara-caraṇa-śiro-grīvâdayo hy avayavāḥ paraspara-vibhaktā eva tatra pratibhānti, na vyāpy-ākāro, na ca te 'pi
GSP29snyayvau:1656: pratibhāsāt tāvad yāvat paramâṇava eva prathante, vyāpi-rūpasya
GSP29snyayvau:1657: vicārâkṣamatvād ity ukta-prāyam. nâpy anumānāt sthira-sthūra-vastu-siddhiḥ, pratyakṣa-parigṛhītaṃ hi sambandham āsādyânumānaṃ pravarteta, yadā ca tat
GSP29snyayvau:1659: api tat-pratibandha-mūlakaṃ tad-gocaram eva pāramparyeṇa pratiṣṭhāpayati,
GSP29snyayvau:1663: puruṣâdy-avayavināṃ smaraṇāt pratyabhijñānāc ca. nâitad asti, teṣām
GSP29snyayvau:1664: alīka-vāsanā-prabodhôtthāpitatvena prāmāṇyâyogāt. kiṃ ca, tāny api svayaṃ
GSP29snyayvau:1665: vartamāna-kṣaṇa eva prakāśante, viplava-vaśāt tu svarūpam eva
GSP29snyayvau:1667: adhyāropayanti; tan na tebhyo 'pi vyāpi-vastu-siddhiḥ. tasmād vyāpini rūpe
GSP29snyayvau:1668: pramāṇânavatārāt paraspara-viśliṣṭāḥ paramâṇava eva paramârthata iti
GSP29snyayvau:1670: [NAV_29.18] tad idam artha-svarūpa-nirūpaṇa-nipuṇānāṃ nayānāṃ matam upavarṇitam; adhunā śabda-vicāra-caturāṇām upavarṇyate. tatra trayāṇām api
GSP29snyayvau:1671: śabdâdīnām idaṃ sādhāraṇamākūtaṃ, yad uta śabda eva paramārtho nârthas,
GSP29snyayvau:1672: tasya tad-avyatiriktatvāt. pārthakyena vastutva-siddheḥ katham avyatireka iti cet, pramāṇād iti brūmaḥ. tathā hi: na vyatirikto 'rthaḥ śabdāt,
GSP29snyayvau:1673: tat-pratītau tasya pratīyamānatvād, iha yat-pratītau yat pratīyate tat
GSP29snyayvau:1674: tato 'vyatiriktaṃ bhavati, tad yathā -- śabde pratīyamāne tasyâiva
GSP29snyayvau:1675: svarūpaṃ, pratīyate ca śabde pratīyamāne 'rtho, 'to 'sau tato 'vyatirikta
GSP29snyayvau:1676: iti. agṛhīta-saṅketasya ghaṭa-śabda-śravaṇe 'pi ghaṭa-pratīter abhāvād vyatirikta iti ced, evaṃ tarhi viṣasya māraṇâtmakatvaṃ tad-ajñasya na
GSP29snyayvau:1677: pratibhātîti tat tato vyatiriktam āpadyeta, na câitad asti,
GSP29snyayvau:1679: sambandhasya ca vyatiriktena saha prāg evâpāstatvāt; tan
GSP29snyayvau:1680: nâbuddha-pramātṛ-doṣeṇa vastuno 'nyathātvam, anyathândho rūpaṃ nêkṣata iti
GSP29snyayvau:1681: tad-abhāvo 'pi pratipattavya iti. ye nirabhidhānā vartante 'rthās teṣāṃ śabdāt pārthakyena vastutva-siddhir iti cen, na, nirabhidhānârthâbhāvāt,

GSP29snyayvau:1761: 'pi viśliṣṭayor abheda-buddhy-utpādanâkṣamatvāt, tasyâpi vyatiriktatayā padârthântarâviśeṣān nityatvâikatva-sarva-gatatvâdibhiś ca sarvatra tat-karaṇa-prasaṅgāc ca. yat punar avādīr, yad uta: yadi sāmānyaṃ viśeṣa-niṣṭhaṃ, viśeṣo vā sāmānya-vyāptaḥ samupalabhyeta, tato viviktayos tayoḥ kvacid anupalambhād yo 'yaṃ vivikteṣu sāmānyeṣu viśeṣeṣu
GSP29snyayvau:1762: câbhidhānârtha-kriyā-lakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ sa samastaḥ pralayaṃ yāyāl,

GSP29snyayvau:2058: atha dvitīya-kṣaṇe nâsti sa svabhāva iti brūṣe, hanta kṣaṇikatvam evâḍhaukate, 'tādavasthyasya tal-lakṣaṇatvāt. kiṃ ca, vināśa-hetur
GSP29snyayvau:2059: bhāvasya vināśaṃ vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ vā kuryāt? vyatirikta-karaṇe na kiñcit kṛtaṃ syāt, tataś ca bhāvas tādavasthyam anubhavet. tat-sambandhaḥ
GSP29snyayvau:2060: kriyata iti cen, na sambandhasya tādātmya-tad-utpatti-vyatiriktasya
GSP29snyayvau:2061: pratiṣedhāt. na cânayor anyataraḥ sambandho 'tra samasti, vyatirekiṇā sârddhaṃ tādātmyâyogād, anya-hetukasya paścād utpannasya tad-utpatti-vaikalyāt. tan na vyatirikto vināśaḥ kartuṃ yuktaḥ.
GSP29snyayvau:2062: avyatirikta-karaṇe punas tam eva bhāvaṃ vināśa-hetuḥ karotîti prāptam,
GSP29snyayvau:2063: avyatirekasya tad-rūpatā-lakṣaṇatvāt. na câsau kartavyaḥ, sva-hetor eva
GSP29snyayvau:2064: niṣpannatvāt, tat-karaṇe ca tasyâvasthānam eva syān, na pralayaḥ. tan
GSP29snyayvau:2065: nâvinaśvara-svabhāvānāṃ paścāt kathañcid api vināśaḥ kartuṃ śakyo,
GSP29snyayvau:2066: vinaśvara-svabhāvānāṃ punaḥ sva-hetu-balâyātatvāt prāg api pratikṣaṇa-bhāvī, na kāraṇântarâpekṣaḥ, svabhāvasya niyata-rūpatvāt;
GSP29snyayvau:2068: [NAV_31.4] atrôcyate -- satyam etat, kiṃ tu yathā vināśa-kāraṇâyogāt
GSP29snyayvau:2069: pratikṣaṇa-bhāvī vināśo bhavadbhiḥ pratipadyate, tathâiva sthity-utpattī
GSP29snyayvau:2070: pratikṣaṇa-bhāvinyau kiṃ na pratipadyete, tad-dhetūnām api vicāryamāṇānām ayogāt. tathā hi: sthiti-hetunā tāvat svayam asthira-svabhāvā bhāvāḥ sthāpyeran sthira-svabhāvā vā? na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣodaṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvau:2072: cetanâcetana-svabhāvavad, anyathā svabhāvatā-hāneḥ. dvitīya-pakṣe punaḥ svayaṃ sthira-svabhāvānāṃ kiṃ sthiti-hetunā? sthitir nêṣyata eva,
GSP29snyayvau:2073: tenânabhyupagatôpālambha evâyam iti ced, hanta hato 'sy, evaṃ hi bhāvāḥ
GSP29snyayvau:2074: kṣaṇa-mātram api na tiṣṭheyuḥ. kṣaṇa-bhāvinîṣyata evêti cet, sā tarhy asthiti-svabhāvānāṃ hetu-śatair api kartuṃ na pāryata iti brūmaḥ,
GSP29snyayvau:2075: tat-svabhāvatve punar hetu-vyāpāra-nairarthakyāt. ahetukā satī sakala-kālaṃ bhavatîti datto jalâñjaliḥ pratikṣaṇa-vilayasya.
GSP29snyayvau:2076: tathôtpāda-hetur api tat-svabhāvasyôtpattiṃ vidadhyād atat-svabhāvasya vā?
GSP29snyayvau:2077: na tāvad ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ kakṣī-kartuṃ yuktaḥ, svayam utpādakasyôtpādane
GSP29snyayvau:2078: vyāpriyamāṇo hi hetuḥ piṣṭaṃ pinaṣṭi, śaṅkhaṃ dhavalayati, tad-abhāve 'pi
GSP29snyayvau:2081: utpādya-koṭim adhyāsīran, viśeṣâbhāvāt; tataś ca na kaścid atyantâbhāvaḥ syāt. tad yathā nirhetukatvān nāśaḥ pratikṣaṇa-bhāvī, tathâiva
GSP29snyayvau:2082: darśita-yukteḥ sthity-utpattī apîti trayâkrāntaṃ sakalaṃ vastu jātam
GSP29snyayvau:2085: aparâparârtha-grahaṇa-pariṇāmaiś côtpāda-vyaya-dharmakaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pramātêti balāt siddhim
GSP29snyayvau:2089: kathaṃ neyaḥ? na câyam apahnotuṃ śakyaḥ! tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvau:2091: nôpalambhyanta iti taj-janyā ity ucyante. sthitir api vināśa-kāraṇa-sannidhānāt prāk tad-balād eva, tathā nāśo 'pi
GSP29snyayvau:2093: pratīyate, nâhetukaḥ. tat katham etad iti?
GSP29snyayvau:2094: [NAV_31.6] atrôcyate -- na vayaṃ sarvathā hetūnāṃ vyāpāraṃ vārayāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi svayam utpāda-vyaya-sthity-ātmanā vivartamānasya dravyasya hetavas
GSP29snyayvau:2095: tad-viśeṣa-karaṇe vyāpāram anubhavanti, tenâiva sârddhaṃ teṣām
GSP29snyayvau:2098: pratīti-vikalāṃ yuktiṃ yukti-vinākṛtāṃ vā pratītiṃ nâṅgī-kurmahe,
GSP29snyayvau:2105: kartā san bhoktâpîti kākvôpanyāsād, akartur bhogânupapatter,
GSP29snyayvau:2107: japā-kusumâdi-sannidhāna-vaśāt sphaṭike raktatâdi-vyapadeśavad akartur api prakṛty-upadhāna-vaśāt sukha-duḥkhâdi-bhoga-vyapadeśo yuktas; tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvau:2110: "buddhy-adhyavasitam arthaṃ puruṣaś cetayata" iti-vacanād iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvau:2115: andhôpalâdau raktatânāvir-bhavantī tatra punar āvir-bhavantī tasya
GSP29snyayvau:2116: tathā-vidhaṃ pariṇāmaṃ lakṣayaty, anyathândhôpalavat tatrâpi na prāduḥṣyāt. tan nâkriyasya bhoktṛtôpapadyata iti.
GSP29snyayvau:2121: samavāyasya prāg eva pratikṣiptatvāt, sambandhântarasya ca vyatirekiṇā
GSP29snyayvau:2122: sākam anupapatter, anyatrânyathânupapannatvāt. na ca vyatirekiṇi jñāne tat samasti, tad-grāhaka-pramāṇâbhāvād, avyatirekânubhavasya ca tad-bādhakatvāt. kiṃ ca, yadi samavāya-balād ātmani jñānaṃ samavaiti,
GSP29snyayvau:2123: tadâtmanāṃ samavāyasya ca vibhutvād eka-rūpatvāc ca sarvâtmasu kiṃ na
GSP29snyayvau:2124: samavaiti, viśeṣâbhāvāt? tathā ca devadatta-jṭānena yajṭadattâdayo 'py
GSP29snyayvau:2125: artha-tattvaṃ buddhyeran. anyac ca vijṭānôdaya-samaye 'pi yādṛśaḥ
GSP29snyayvau:2126: prāg-avasthāyāṃ tādṛśa eva santiṣṭhamānaḥ prāg apramātā paścāt pramātêti bruvāṇaḥ khalûnmattatām ātmany āvir-bhāvayati, nâparam ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvau:2131: nanu ca kāyâkāra-pariṇatāni bhūtāny evâtma-vyatirekiṇīṃ cetanām
GSP29snyayvau:2132: utkālayanti; sā ca tathā-vidha-pariṇāma-pariṇateṣu teṣu santiṣṭhate,
GSP29snyayvau:2133: tad-abhāve punas teṣv eva nilīyata iti; tad-vyatirekânubhave 'pi na
GSP29snyayvau:2135: asti, dvayaṃ hi tāvad etat saṃyogam anubhavad upalababhyate --
GSP29snyayvau:2136: paṭca-bhūtâtmakaṃ śarīraṃ cetanā ca. tatrâpi śarīraṃ bahir-mukhâkāreṇa
GSP29snyayvau:2137: bodhenârtha-rūpatayā jaḍam anubhūyate, cetanā punar antar-mukhâkāreṇa
GSP29snyayvau:2139: pratibhāsa-nirākṛtatvān nâśaṅkitaḥ. vyatirekiṇoḥ punaḥ prakāśamānayor yadi bhūtāny eva cetanām utkālayantîti bhavadbhiḥ parikalpyate, tadā cetanâiva bhavântarād utpatti-sthānamāyātā paṭca-bhūta-bhrānti-janakaṃ śarīraṃ
GSP29snyayvau:2140: nirvartayet, punar bhavântaraṃ yātukāmā muṭcet, tat tayâdhiṣṭhitaṃ gamanâdi-ceṣṭāṃ kuryāt, tad-viyuktaṃ punaḥ kāṣṭhavat tiṣṭhed iti
GSP29snyayvau:2141: jīva-sampādyam eva śarīraṃ, na punar asau tat-sampādya ity, etat parikalpanaṃ yuktataraṃ paśyāmaḥ, jīvasya cetanāvataḥ sakarmakatayâparâpara-bhava-bhramaṇâparâpara-śarīra-nirvartanayor
GSP29snyayvau:2143: nôpalabhyata iti ced, bhūtāny api tarhi kāyâkāra-dhāraṇa-dvāreṇa cetanām
GSP29snyayvau:2144: utkālayantîti pratyakṣeṇa nôpalakṣyanta iti samāno nyāhaḥ. atha
GSP29snyayvau:2146: nânyadêty-anyathânupapatti-vaśāt taj-janyêti parikalpyata, evaṃ tarhi mṛtâvasthāyāṃ kāyâkāram ābibhrāṇeṣv api nôpalabdhā, kāyâkāra-pariṇāmo vā kādācitkatayā hetv-antarâpekṣîty-anyathânupapatti-vaśād eva
GSP29snyayvau:2148: pratipadyāmahe. kiṃ ca, jīvas tāvat karma-caitanya-sambandhāc
GSP29snyayvau:2149: charīra-nirvartanârthaṃ pravarata iti yuktam evâitad, bhūtāni punaḥ kiṃ-bhūtāni cetanā-karaṇe pravarteran: sacetanāni niścetanāni vā? yady ādyaḥ kalpas, tato vikalpa-yugalam avatarati: tac caitanyaṃ tebhyo bhinnam abhinnam vā? yadi bhinnaṃ, tadā puruṣa-śarīravat tatrâpi bhūtaiḥ saha
GSP29snyayvau:2150: vartamānam api bhūta-vilakṣaṇam ātma-kāraṇam anumāpayatîti tad-avasthâiva
GSP29snyayvau:2151: jīva-siddhiḥ. athâbhinnaṃ, tathā sati samasta-bhūtānām aikyaṃ prasajaty,
GSP29snyayvau:2153: bhūtāni tenâyam adoṣa iti cen, na, tat-sampādya-puruṣa-śarīre 'pi
GSP29snyayvau:2154: taj-janya-pañca-caitanya-prasaṅgāt. pañcâpi sambhūya bṛhat-puruṣa-caitanyaṃ bahavas tilā iva taila-ghaṭaṃ janayantîti cet, tat tarhi puruṣa-caitanyaṃ kiṃ teṣām eva saṃyogo yad vā tad-utpādyam, anyad
GSP29snyayvau:2155: eva? yady ādhyaḥ kalpas, tad ayuktaṃ, caitanyānāṃ parasparaṃ miśraṇâbhāvena saṃyoga-virodhād, itarathā bahu-puruṣa-caitanyāni sambhūya
GSP29snyayvau:2156: bṛhattama-caitanyântaram ārabheran. atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣas, tatrâpi teṣāṃ kim anvayo 'sti nâsti vā? yady asti, tad ayuktaṃ, prāgvat
GSP29snyayvau:2157: taj-janya-caitanya-pañca-rūpatâpatteḥ. atha nâsti, tad apy acāru,
GSP29snyayvau:2158: niranvayôtpādasya pramāṇa-bādhitatvāt. tan na sacetanāni bhūtāni
GSP29snyayvau:2159: cetanā-karaṇe vyāpāra-bhāñji bhavitum arhanti. nâpi niścetanāni, teṣām
GSP29snyayvau:2160: atyanta-vilakṣaṇatayā caitanyôtpāda-virodhād, itarathā sikatâdayas tailâdi-karaṇe vyāpriyeran. kiṃ ca, tat-samudāya-mātra-sādhyaṃ vā caitanyaṃ syād viśiṣṭa-tat-pariṇāma-sādhyaṃ vā. na tāvad ādyā kḷptir,
GSP29snyayvau:2162: dvitīya-vikḷptau punaḥ kiṃ tad vaiśiṣṭyam iti vācyam. kāyâkāra-pariṇāma
GSP29snyayvau:2163: iti cet, sa tarhi sarvadā kasmān na bhavati? kutaścid dhetv-antarâpekṣaṇād
GSP29snyayvau:2164: iti cet, tat tarhi hetv-antaraṃ bhavântarâyāta-jīva-caitanyam ity
GSP29snyayvau:2168: gamanâdi-ceṣṭânupalabdheḥ; tan na kāyākāra-pariṇāma-janyaṃ caitanyam, api tu sa eva taj-janya iti yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. na pratyakṣād anyat pramāṇam
GSP29snyayvau:2169: asti, na ca tena para-loka-gamanâgamanâdikaṃ caitanyasyôpalakṣyate, tena dṛṣṭāny eva bhūtāni tat-kāraṇatayā kalpanīyānîti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvau:2171: tathā ca bhūyāṃsy anumānāni para-lokânuyāyi-jīva-sādhakāni pravarteran.
GSP29snyayvau:2173: pūrvâbhilāṣa-pūrvako, 'bhilāṣatvād, dvitīya-divasâdi-stanâbhilāṣavat. tad idam anumānam ādya-stanâbhilāṣasyâbhilāṣântara-pūrvakatvam anumāpayad arthâpattyā para-loka-yāyi-jīvamākṣipati, taj-janmany abhilāṣântarâbhāvāt.
GSP29snyayvau:2174: evam anyad apy udāhāryam ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvau:2175: [NAV_31.11] tad ayaṃ sva-para-prakāśakaḥ kartā bhoktā nityânityâtmako
GSP29snyayvau:2183: [NAV_32.1] pramāṇāni pratyakṣâdīny; ādi-śabdān naya-parigrahas, teṣāṃ vyavasthā pratiniyata-lakṣaṇâdi-rūpā maryādā, sêyam anantarôkta-sthityā
GSP29snyayvau:2184: prakīrtitêti saṃsargaḥ. kiṃ-bhūtêty āha: ādiḥ prabhavo, nidhanaṃ paryanto,
GSP29snyayvau:2185: na vidyete ādi-nidhane yasyâsau tathā-vidha ātmā svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ
GSP29snyayvau:2188: rūḍhâpi, tad-aprasiddhau nikhila-vyavahārôccheda-prasaṅgāt, tad-ucchede ca vicārânutthāne na kasyacit tattvasya pratiṣṭhitiḥ. prakīrtitā
GSP29snyayvau:2191: anadhyavasāya-viparyāsa-rūpa-vyāmoha-sadbhāvāt, tad-apanodârthaṃ ca sati sāmarthye karuṇāvatāṃ pravṛtter iti.
GSP29snyayvau:2194: hetur nayâśrita-kutīrthi-mṛgān ananyatrāṇān vihāya jinam eti tam āśrayadhvaṃ // NAV_32.1:1
GSP29snyayvau:2195: bhaktir mayā bhagavati prakaṭī-kṛtêyaṃ tac-chāsanâṃśa-kathanān na matiḥ svakīyā /
GSP29snyayvau:2196: mohād ato yad iha kiñcid abhūd asādhu tat sādhavaḥ kṛta-kṛpā mayi śodhayantu // NAV_32.1:2
GSP29snyayvau:2197: nyāyâvatāra-vivṛtiṃ vividhāṃ vidhitsoḥ siddhaḥ śubho ya iha
